description: Keda is an iOS app which allows users to post high end clothing and acccesories for rent in a safe marketplace. It uses Swift, Firebase, Real-Time Database and allows users to pay using Apple Pay, Stripe and PayPal
A hotel reservation system built using Angular.js. It uses a custom GraphQL api and Mongo DB. This web application allows users to view, book and cancel hotel bookings.
An Amazon Clone built using React.js and Firebase. It uses cloud functions custom api to store user data and connect with the database
An Employee management system built using React and MySQL. It uses cloud functions custom api to store
A Threejs app which moves a cube using arrow keys
